segments.text: I see the woman standing in that puddle, and it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, and the water just keeps coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, standing on that stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll share or if the boy will eat them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a mess, but it’s kind of charming in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes everything look so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be surprised when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a little comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR
